settings.journal.title: Create Match Journals
settings.journal.hint: Enabling this will create matching journal entries item macro to check if an item has a macro and roll that instead of the default system's execution.
settings.journalp.title: Journal Default Permissions
settings.journalp.hint: Changing this will set the default permissiosn for the journal entries
settings.visibilty.title: Player access
settings.visibilty.hint: Enabling this will make it so your players will receive the popups. Disable for GM Only
exclusionsmanager.title: Exclusions Manager
exclusionsmanager.hint: Add which scenes should not dynamically generate video elements
exclusionsmanager.label: Configure
